title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4235.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4235.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of these regulations is to set forth the
application process, determine eligibility and codify administration by the New

York State Urban Development Corporation of the Job Retention Working Capital

Loan Fund authorized by chapter 53, section 8-b, chapter 54, section 1, and
chapter 57, section 368 of the Laws of 1993. The purpose of the program is to
provide financial assistance in the form of working capital loans or loan
guarantees to companies at imminent risk of reducing employment and grants for
the benefit of communities whose employment is impacted by a planned military
base closing and/or downsizing and downsizing by a county's major
employer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes

4235.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
